name: Cyber-Merge: GMTK Game Jam 2021 Version
description:
Clear levels by using two characters who have the ability to join together and become one!

Individually, one can jump but cannot fight while the other can fight but cannot jump!

Some tasks requiring one, others requiring both. 

Do your best to clear the levels! 

Credits:

Charles (ZeroZXDev): Programming, Modeling, Art, Game Design

Killian (KillianCU): Level Design, Music/SFX, Game Design
